verses.verse: Woe <WH1945> to Ariel <WH740>, to Ariel <WH740>, the city <WH7151> where David <WH1732> lived <WH2583>! add <WH5595> you year <WH8141> to year <WH8141>; let them kill <WH5362> sacrifices <WH2282>.
Yet I will distress <WH6693> Ariel <WH740>, and there shall be heaviness <WH8386> and sorrow <WH592>: and it shall be unto me as Ariel <WH740>.
And I will camp <WH2583> against you round about <WH1754>, and will lay siege <WH6696> against you with a mountain <WH4674>, and I will raise <WH6965> forts against you <WH4694>.

And you shall be brought down <WH8213>, and shall speak <WH1696> out of the ground <WH776>, and your speech <WH565> shall be low <WH7817> out of the dust <WH6083>, and your voice <WH6963> shall be <WH178>, as of one that has a familiar spirit, out of the ground <WH776>, and your speech <WH565> shall whisper <WH6850> out of the dust <WH6083>.

Moreover the multitude <WH1995> of your strangers <WH2114> shall be like small <WH1851> dust <WH80>, and the multitude <WH1995> of the terrible ones <WH6184> shall be as chaff <WH4671> that passes away <WH5674>: Yes <WH6621>, it shall be at a instant suddenly <WH6597>.

You shall be visited <WH6485> of the Lord <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> with thunder <WH7482>, and with earthquake <WH7494>, and great <WH1419> noise <WH6963>, with storm <WH5492> and storm <WH5591>, and the flame <WH3851> of devouring <WH398> fire <WH784>.

And the multitude <WH1995> of all the nations <WH1471> that fight <WH6633> against Ariel <WH740>, even all that fight <WH6638> against her and her munition <WH4685>, and that distress <WH6693> her <WH2472>, shall be as a dream of a night <WH3915> vision <WH2377>.

It shall even be as when a hungry <WH7457> man dreams <WH2492>, and <WH398>, behold, he eat; but he awakes <WH6974>, and his soul <WH5315> is empty <WH7386>: or as when <WH834> a thirsty man <WH6771> dreams <WH2492>, and <WH8354>, behold, he drinks; but he awakes <WH6974>, and <WH5889>, behold, he is faint, and his soul <WH5315> has appetite <WH8264>: so shall the multitude <WH1995> of all the nations <WH1471> be <WH6633>, that fight against mountain <WH2022> Zion <WH6726>.

Stay <WH4102> yourselves <WH8539>, and wonder; cry you out <WH8173>, and cry <WH8173>: they are drunken <WH7937>, but not with wine <WH3196>; they stagger <WH5128>, but not with strong drink <WH7941>.

For the Lord <WH3068> has poured out <WH5258> upon you the spirit <WH7307> of deep sleep <WH8639>, and has closed <WH6105> your eyes <WH5869>: the prophets <WH5030> and your rulers <WH7218>, the seers <WH2374> has he covered <WH3680>.

And the vision <WH2380> of all is become unto you as the words <WH1697> of a book <WH5612> that is sealed <WH2856>, which men deliver <WH5414> to one that is learned <WH3045>, saying <WH559>, Read <WH7121> this <WH559>, I pray you: and he says, I cannot <WH3201>; for it is sealed <WH2856>:
And the book <WH5612> is delivered <WH5414> to him that is not learned <WH3045>, saying <WH559>, Read <WH7121> this <WH559>, I pray you: and he says, I am not learned <WH3045>.

Therefore the Lord <WH136> said <WH559>, Forasmuch <WH3282> as this people <WH5971> draw near <WH5066> me with their mouth <WH6310>, and with their lips <WH8193> do honor <WH3513> me <WH7368>, but have removed their heart <WH3820> far <WH7368> from me <WH3374>, and their fear toward me is taught <WH3925> by the precept <WH4687> of men <WH582>:

Therefore <WH3254>, behold, I will proceed to do a marvelous work <WH6381> among this people <WH5971>, even a marvelous work <WH6381> and a wonder <WH6382>: for the wisdom <WH2451> of their wise <WH2450> men shall perish <WH6>, and the understanding <WH998> of their prudent <WH995> men shall be hid <WH5641>.

Woe <WH1945> unto them that seek deep <WH6009> to hide <WH5641> their counsel <WH6098> from the Lord <WH3068>, and their works <WH4639> are in the dark <WH4285>, and they say <WH559>, Who sees <WH7200> us <WH3045>? and who knows us?

Surely your turning of things upside down <WH2017> shall be esteemed <WH2803> as the potter <WH3335>'s clay <WH2563>: for shall the work <WH4639> say <WH559> of him that made <WH6213> it <WH6213>, He made me not <WH3336>? or shall the thing framed say <WH559> of him that framed <WH3335> it <WH995>, He had no understanding?

Is it not yet a very <WH4213> little while <WH4592>, and Lebanon <WH3844> shall be turned <WH7725> into a fruitful field <WH3759>, and the fruitful field <WH3759> shall be esteemed <WH2803> as a forest <WH3293>?

And in that day <WH3117> shall the deaf <WH2795> hear <WH8085> the words <WH1697> of the book <WH5612>, and the eyes <WH5869> of the blind <WH5787> shall see <WH7200> out of obscurity <WH652>, and out of darkness <WH2822>.
The meek <WH6035> also shall increase <WH3254> their joy <WH8057> in the Lord <WH3068>, and the poor <WH34> among men <WH120> shall rejoice <WH1523> in the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478>.
For the terrible one <WH6184> is brought to nothing <WH656>, and the scorner <WH3887> is consumed <WH3615>, and all that watch <WH8245> for iniquity <WH205> are cut off <WH3772>:

That make a man <WH120> a offender <WH2398> for a word <WH1697>, and lay a snare <WH6983> for him that reproves <WH3198> in the gate <WH8179>, and turn aside <WH5186> the just <WH6662> for a thing of nothing <WH8414>.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068>, who redeemed <WH6299> Abraham <WH85>, concerning the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>, Jacob <WH3290> shall not now be ashamed <WH954>, neither shall his face <WH6440> now wax pale <WH2357>.

But when he sees <WH7200> his sons <WH3206>, the work <WH4639> of my hands <WH3027>, in the midst <WH7130> of him <WH6942>, they shall sanctify my name <WH8034>, and sanctify <WH6942> the Holy One <WH6918> of Jacob <WH3290>, and shall fear <WH6206> the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478>.
They also that erred <WH8582> in spirit <WH7307> shall come <WH3045> to understanding <WH998>, and they that murmured <WH7279> shall learn <WH3925> teaching <WH3948>.
